website_summaries.verdict: The Sims 3: Supernatural is filled with charm and ambition, but issues with zombies and lunar cycles cast a shadow over its best parts.
pros: Allows for playing as werewolves, vampires, ghosts, witches, and othersNew town oozes with spooky personalityExtensive new cosmetic options and traits add varietyAlchemy and fortune-teller careers are fun
cons: Bugged lunar cycle disrupts gameplayZombies are more of an annoyance than a worthwhile feature

customer_reviews.title: Game does not work and arrived in terrible condition
customer_reviews.text: Since I ordered a new game, I expected it to come in good condition and inside of a case, or at least a sturdy package to keep the disc from being damaged. Instead, I received a scratched disc in a paper envelope that was falling apart and secured with a rubber band. I tried to download the game twice and it will not work. The product description stated "brand new" and "factory sealed." I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: IF

customer_reviews.title: Weird Fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchases for my wife & daughter who are huge Sims 3 fans. They both got a lot of laughs and showed me things they can do with their Sims which looks quite bizarre to someone who hasn't played this version. Impressive graphics, lots of content, and bottom line very entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: saint4God

customer_reviews.title: Great game and works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and at a good price if u buy new. It comes with a disk but since its 2020 disks for sims 3 no longer have use so just use the code instead of putting in the disk and logging into origin. Once u log into origin press redeem a new code and type in the code u were given and it automatically starts downloading!!
customer_reviews.author: jenrob11

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fantasy
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy the unknown and mythical, the crazy and mysterious - this expansion is perfect. Always wanted to be a fairy? You can find your wings with this expansion. Love vampires? Take a bite out of this download! Find werewolves intriguing? Sink your canines into this expansion! Think casting spells as a witch would be fun? You wand to download this expansion! (Sorry, the puns got out of hand.) Your sim can study alchemy to make potent elixirs or they can mesmerize their neighbor into allowing them to drink their blood! Whatever strange mythical thing you're into, live it out in this awesome expansion!
customer_reviews.author: pirate89RAWR

customer_reviews.title: Not your best work
customer_reviews.text: This is my least favorite EP. Maybe if I really got into it, it'd be fun but the full moon ends up being a pain and making your friends mess with u if you're outside, the light from the moon makes things difficult to see in your house, wants you to do annoying things for lifetime rewards. It just wasn't for me. Sometimes I consider uninstalling it. I was expecting it to be more like Makin' Magic for Sims1 which was epic.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Mostly fun, but a little bit irritating
customer_reviews.text: I love some of this expansion pack. Having werewolves and fairies and wizards can be a lot of fun. And I enjoyed a lot of the objects, also. However, the zombie hordes are downright irritating. Your choices end up being either to fence in your entire lot and be very precise about who is allowed though the gates, or to turn off the full moons and lose out on some of the other unique full moon features. My game also had a propensity to freeze certain visitors (and sometimes household members!) on my lot during the full moons, not letting them be reset. Overall, it's an enjoyable expansion. Just know what you're signing up for.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: An Okay Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay expansion pack. There isn't tons of new 'stuff' but a few of the things are cool. I sort of like the alchemy stations and the wands, but there are way to many supernaturals. Also, the zombies are super annoying. I just turn off most of the types of supernaturals when I don't want them. I have a lot of expansion packs and they are usually well worth the price, but this one fell a little short. Overall, it was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Messed up my Sims game....
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept, if it worked I might actually enjoy it but ever since I added this, along with Pets 3 to my game I have had nothing but headaches. I can't play without freezing glitches. It won't let me place certain families I have made, and freezes whenever I try to visit someplace in town. Other family members who bought this same expansion, as well as pets have been having their game freeze constantly as well. I have all but given up on trying to play. I tried an uninstall and reinstall to no avail. :( Think carefully before you purchase this, or Pets 3.
customer_reviews.author: RealTalk

customer_reviews.title: Great expansion with loads of new stuff
customer_reviews.text: One of the most unique Sims 3 expansions I've had the pleasure of playing. The Sims 3 has always been known for it's mix of both quasi-realistic life simulation and a heavy sprinkling of the absurd. This expansion lives up to that in spades. It's about the time you're trying to make sure both the vampires and fairies at your child's birthday party are enjoying yourself that you forget the ridiculousness of the expansion and just sort of learn to accept it's quirkiness. Highly recommended. That being said, I would get World Adventure, Late Night, and Ambitions first, as they expand the base game more naturally (pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fairies, Ghosts, Werewolves, oh my!
customer_reviews.text: I own all of the Sims 3 EPs except for the Katy Perry pack (I know, I know, I have an addiction), and after the Pets EP, this one is my favorite. It adds TONS of CAS options and social interactions, probably moreso than any of the other EPs. I wont bore you with the details of the entire game, but I would definitely recommend this one if you are trying to pick just one!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love the special Sim types
customer_reviews.text: I got the Supernatural expansion pack along with all of the other expansion packs, and absolutely loved it. I missed having the special Sim types from Sims 2, and wanted to have werewolves back. This along with Seasons, Late Night, and University runs really well on my computer, which has pretty average specs. If you're less interested in new furniture and clothing and looking more for new features and activities, Supernatural is probably what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: I started again as something fun to do
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played the Sims in years. I started again as something fun to do. I'm still not one of those players consumed with the series. This is a nice extension game to play when you have nothing to do and you don't want to read. It'll keep you entertained. As for the item being shipped on time: it arrived very quickly and was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Good Game with some problems
customer_reviews.text: I love Sims and I was so excited to get this game. On both of my computers it had issues running. It would freeze and sometimes never come out of it. Both of my computers exceeded the system requirements. I looked for a fix online and did what people recommended, but it still had problems. Finally, on my laptop I ran a system reboot to see if that would fix the problem. After I re-loaded the game, it stopped freezing. However, it still runs slow sometimes and take forever to save compared to all my other Sims games. If EA can fix the slowness problem, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tammyk95

customer_reviews.title: Most entertaining Sims expansion for me yet...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very sporadic Sims3 player. Saw this new expansion, purchased and started playing again. Originally made a fairy and witch couple, had fun casting spells. Witch went out to take care of some zombies destroying my plants outside, spell backfired, he died. The fairy sim was of course devastated. Dead sim started haunting the house, fairy sim seduced him and got pregnant. Finally learned to make Ambrosia to bring ghost son and husband back to life. Anyway, very entertaining. Would recommend to any with the original game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this expansion! It was easy to install and adds a ton of fun chaos to the Sim neighborhood. So many features included: clothes, abilities, creatures, hairstyles, items, and MORE. One thing I like is that, if you choose to make your Sim a ghost or fairy, you can design the look of the ghost or the fairy's wings. Werewolves are also fun because you can design what they look like in their beast form. So there's a lot of choice in creating your supernatural Sim which is loads of fun if you enjoy getting creative before you play. I'll never tire of this expansion because I keep discovering new features within each supernatural's abilities and traits.
customer_reviews.author: lindy

customer_reviews.title: Ghosts, Vampires, Werewolfs and Zombies oh my!
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying that I do like the expansion. I was a bit dissapointed with a couple things. The zombies multiply like rabbits for one thing. They just pop out of no where and it never seems to end. While new and interesting the Fairy's, Werewolfs and Ghosts are not very different. That being said neither were the Vampires. I will end by saying that I really like the new objects, the moon phases and the Witches! The alchemy was cool and I enjoyed lvling it up. I also like the spell casting and the broom riding.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaMM

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say this is my favorite expansion pack, but it actually annoys me. Seems like ALL of my male sims have wings, they are all fairies. Too many ghost. They are everywhere and annoying. The female sims howl at night outside my bedroom window lol... I thought it would just be a few of them in the game, which would be cool. But it seems to be all of my sims in some way are creepy now. Does anybody have a idea of how to limit the amount of fairies and werewolves and ghost we have in our game?
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: I'm a huge Simmer & Durn Proud Of It!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell ya, I love this game. It adds a lil flair and awesomeness to the sims. You can be a witch, genie, vampire, werewolf, fairy and ghost. I love the awesome creativity that Supernatural has and how you can do things like spells & such. I am a long time simmer since they first came out with the original first and this game and every game maxis comes out with for the sims are awesome. I highly recommend this game to anyone. Who has two thumbs and loves the sims "this gal!" (Tips cowboy hat)
customer_reviews.author: The Texan Sweet GeniusTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and no issues
customer_reviews.text: Had this game for a while now and am happy to report, I have no issues thus far with the game. In addition, the game has a very large amount of new items for all modes, (build, buy, and create a sim), and all of the objects are very useful and fun to use. This is a great game if you are trying to limit yourself to expansion packs to avoid unwanted crashes as there are lots of new objects, create a sim traits, and new careers. great game - worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This expansion isnt for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Its great. But im not so much of a supernatural fan. I use fairy and witches alot. And use alot of items from the pack. But i seem to use it more than Into the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: oh yes prease
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing the base game for almost a year now & started getting bored with it. thought I'd take it up a notch. oh man, this game has got me glued to my computer. thankfully I don't have a life so I can get away with it. the amount of new stuff that I can do is awesome! I even had a ghost baby! (couldn't do it before) I do suggest this if you're ready to get your first expansion pack, you're gonna have a blast.
customer_reviews.author: boompow

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on
customer_reviews.text: This definitely added a new level of excitement to the game. Being creative with the zombie attacking plants will help, especially if you have a garden and am spending a lot of time trying to grow those special plants and herbs. So far I've spent all of my time with the vampire species and I'm still learning new things to do. This is an excellent upgrade to the series and if you played and enjoyed the Magic expansion on Sims II, then this one is for you too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.Top Contributor: Star Trek

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece who is really into magic and super powers. She had a ball creating her own world of supernatural heroes and villains.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago81

customer_reviews.title: horrible dont buy a digital copy from here!!!! This will rip you off!
customer_reviews.text: I cant even download this game!!!!!! this is seriously ridiculous! I want a refund but they did not have it at the top that there was no refunds. I wanted the one with a disc to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: StarbuyerCali

customer_reviews.title: The Sims 3 Supernatural
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter, below is her review of the game It works fine had no problem installing it. The clothes selection is great but I don't like the shoes that much. I love the hair styles . It did not have that much make up. You can create all different kinds of Sims. Overall it is really a nice game and I love.
customer_reviews.author: Angella W.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use
customer_reviews.text: We can’t even use this on my daughters computer! Now that it’s open we can’t return it. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy! Perfect condition! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy!!! I was worried that since this game was used it may be scratched or such but I received mine in perfect condition! Box and CD were in excellent condition! Very thankful, have been playing since I got it and I love this expansion pack 😊! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Really fun expansion
customer_reviews.text: It's really fun to be able to have super powers and do all sorts of magic tricks in the sims. It reminds of the sims 1 Makin' Magic, which was one of the first sims CD I ever owned. It's also fun to see werewolfs, vampires, etc walking about town. Love the concept
customer_reviews.author: Manoue

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter loves this game. It was a great gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Reece

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the coolest EPs ever
customer_reviews.text: When I first heard about this EP, I was pretty excited. After a failed attempt at getting the digital download from Origin to work, I bought the physical disc and I'm glad I did. This game is full of little pop culture references and Easter eggs that, when I saw them, I couldn't help but laugh. Also, I love the different non-human character options. If I had one complaint, it would be the Plants vs. Zombies stuff. I thought that the pea shooters would actually shoot at the zombies, but it didn't happen. Oh well. I've taken to just building a wall around my Sims' gardens during the full moon and taking it down the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T

customer_reviews.title: but I'm a little disappointed that the game did not come in a case ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't installed this expansion yet, but I'm a little disappointed that the game did not come in a case like I thought it would. All I got was the disk and the installation code. I bought it brand new so I thought I would get a case with it, but no. A little worried about how I will store this game without it getting ruined.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great expansion pack
customer_reviews.text: This expansion pack gives you what it promises. The supernaturals are fun to make and play. I like how the moon controls their moods and powers. This expansion pack makes you want to make everyone a supernatural, since the humans have become really boring. The only drawback is that the zombies cannot be controlled and they just come into your house and there is nothing you can do to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Samtastic

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but watch out for the Full Moon!
customer_reviews.text: I love this expansion, it really opens up the imagination with all the cool features added. I think I use this expansion more than any other expansion I have. The only annoying thing about is it that there are zombie attack during a full moon which can be really cool for some. There is a way to get rid of full moon and they show you how but I'm too lazy to mess with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Rasp

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to the Sims 3 Game
customer_reviews.text: Fun addition to the Sims 3 Game. I particularly like the addition of Broomhilda the skeleton maid. I love that she will beat up would be robbers and in addition to cleaning will fix broken electrical appliances.
customer_reviews.author: AJG85

customer_reviews.title: Sims 3
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game based on the good reviews it seemed to be getting. I guess I am pretty disappointed and wished there was more to it than just a few extra clothes and some powers every now and then. I was very excited to get it, but let down when it wasn't much. I'll be trying Sims 3 Pets next, or waiting for Sims 4. I would wait for Sims 4 before purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: S Kim

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get the installation/activation code!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and got really excited because it was instant download so I could just play it right away, but they didn't send me the codes. In my game library I looked for it and it doesn't even give me the option of a code. Yet when I push play on my computer to play it, origin asks me for a code (which I am unable to provide). I have also tried using codes online but all of them didn't work. I heard it was a great game but I'm sad to say I won't know if it is, simply because amazon didn't send me everything i payed for.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Ehh, i'm just not the supernatural type
customer_reviews.text: It can be fun to sometimes play as a supernatural, but honestly I almost always have supernaturals off. I just stick to the werewolves and sometimes vampires if I do play with the expansion but that gets kind of old pretty quickly. It's fun to revisit sometimes, but not something I play with often.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: sims
customer_reviews.text: I am sims head so this was a great buy to add to my collection
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I used to play sim 1 with all the expansion packs including the one with witches and such (I forgot what the expansion pack was called) but I loved it and I wanted to play something similar to that with this game. I love that you can be various supernatural creatures but I got easily bored with it. However, I'm just a beginner and I know things will start to pick up once I learn everything. I do wish it had some beanstalk growing though like in Sims 1.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Great Expansion Pack!
customer_reviews.text: The Sims 3 Supernatural greatly expanded the play potential for Sims 3, adding a collection of new character types (including witches, werewolves and fairies). The new character types come with their unique capabilities and it's been great fun to experiment with them and attain new kinds of goals. The graphics are awesome. This is a solid, feature-rich expansion pack for Sims 3.
customer_reviews.author: Dora L. McAlpin

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a Sims fanatic and this game is awesome!! I've read people having issues, but I haven't had a problem. And I play on my laptop with zero issues. Of you're into supernatural you'll love this expansion. You can do spells and all kinds of stuff. I've had it over a month now and I'm still finding new stuff. I love it! Definitely worth buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti B.

customer_reviews.title: Lots Of Fun
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want this at first because I didn't want the supernatural aspect in my game other than vampires, which I already had with the Late Night pack, but I'm glad I caved. The witches and fairies are so much fun. I'm not too big on the werewolves, ghosts, or zombies, but the others make up for them. The new town is really cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal-Rain Love

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and the mother keeps having babies. We know toddler Oleg is a witch and we are anxiously waiting to see if baby Lilly is going to be a werewolf. I have no real opinion, but my 8 year old loves this :) as with all the Sims, my daughter also spent a lot of time on the web finding "cheats" which is all part of the fun.
customer_reviews.author: : : L J Hall : :

customer_reviews.title: The instant access version was really easily for me to download and install
customer_reviews.text: The instant access version was really easily for me to download and install. I previously had the discs to install/play the original Sims 3 and a few other expansions packs. I had heard mixed reviews about whether Instant Access would work when the base game (Sims 3) was a disc install, but it has worked perfectly for me. Prior to purchasing, I had decided that I would be willing to incur the additional cost of doing an Instant Access of the base game if I had any trouble since I received different reviews on whether it would work, so that may be something to think about.
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: i don't know...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I feel about it yet... Maybe I haven't explored it enough, but I just don't care for it. I read reviews and descriptions before I bought it and was excited because I love all things supernatural, but then I played and can't seem to find many new noteworthy additions. I'm giving three stars because I can't say it's terrible just yet.
customer_reviews.author: TheresaaDawn

customer_reviews.title: Supernaturally Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love The Sims 3, aside from the glitches, and having been in love with The Sims and their expansion packs, the one that I loved the most was Making Magic. Supernatural opens up a completely new world for controlling the lives of your sims. Say you want them to be a werewolf and go sneak around town and make everyone else a werewolf, you can do that. You can also be a faerie or a witch and cure those individuals that have the werewolf syndrome. If you like the Sims and you like fantasy, buy this expansion pack. It will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: whatshername

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME GAME
customer_reviews.text: Package came in quickly and before the arrival date. This game is absolutely wonderful and I recommend it to any Simmers out there wanting to expand their playing options. I recommend that you do download the limited edition Plants VS. Zombies. I did not do it at first and I swear there was a zombie infestation in my town. It was a little out of hand and all the grunting was getting old. So, install the plants and they will help limit the zombie population. Plus, it's just fun for target practice! I have not experienced any glitching or any other issues with this game. Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Creates a different town so the player can chose if they want to go Supernatural or not
customer_reviews.text: We have a SIMS addict in the house and she has collected just about all the add ons. She likes this one because it's so radically different. They load the supernatural into another town so she can still have her towns with humans (without fear of them being eaten, lol). I believe you can mix and match them too if you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: epic dlc
customer_reviews.text: I like making fairies... The spell system is awesome. (Now I want to go intsall my sims 3 again)
customer_reviews.author: Jelly Bean

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I had decided to skip Supernatural once Seasons was announced, because I felt like Seasons was more the kind of expansion I had been looking for. However, I received Supernatural as a early Christmas present and since then all my Sims have been some type of Supernatural. I'm particularly fond of witches and fairies; but I have also played around a bit with werewolves and I have seen the annoying zombies. I originally, before getting it, did not think that it was worth the money, but I've changed my mind since.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Just what The Sims 3 needed
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting to get The Sims 3 Supernatural for quite some time. I watch all the broadcasts posted for it and watched some let's plays. It was upsetting that I didn't get to it in time for the limited edition option even though it tells me I did by registering but didn't get it. The fact that you can pick so many different supernaturals not just vampires is nice. Adding bonehilda again was a great add in the the game. Not many new outfits were added which stunk but the new options of game play was great! (:
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Game Codes
customer_reviews.text: Game is good. Was kind of disappointed it didn’t come with the game code, but I googled it to look up some codes and one of them worked. So game is good
customer_reviews.author: Renetta

customer_reviews.title: Sim 3 supernatural
customer_reviews.text: This sim 3 supernatural work good and I had no problem playing it
customer_reviews.author: paticia

customer_reviews.title: Fun expansion pack for Sims 3
customer_reviews.text: Fun expansion pack for Sims 3. It really added a new edge to the game. I was somewhat bummed that I couldn't choose to be a Zombie however...
customer_reviews.author: yoadri99

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I had grown bored of the monotony of the Sims until I bought this expansion. It bring so many new possibilities in the game that I'm playing nonstop trying to experience it all! It's definitely loads of fun. I love everything about it and have absolutely zero complaints. Definitely my favorite expansion of them all.
customer_reviews.author: Betty G

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Love the game. If you have trouble downloading, click the "contact us", they help quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Carinna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disc worked great, nice addition to the game to keep it interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I'm afraid I also have to one star a game I haven't even played. I did a clean install of the base game and all my expansions, got rid of all my custom content, patched, updated--the game refused to load. I make it through the animated intro, then sit looking at an empty progress bar for as long as I can stand it. No solutions have worked, and there is apparently no refund option for an instant access game. So much for my $20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this game
customer_reviews.text: Great game! was not messed up when it came. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: I love the new features (being able to create a werewolf, witch/sorcerer or fairy family, the zombification) they also upgraded the vampire type, which they introduced with the "Late Night" expansion pack (you don't have to befriend a vampire and get him to bite you in order to transform into one). They even added the option to have more saving slots (or maybe it was before, but I just noticed), that was really appreciated because I like to play in every neighborhood, and at that rate I already had to decide to delete some families :/
customer_reviews.author: Celia Bayarri Gausi

customer_reviews.title: Fun expansion
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play and great concept. Adds a new degree of difficulty depending on what race you choose to play.
customer_reviews.author: CheshyreCat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it used, and when you can tell by looking at the disc that it's used, that can be a bit scary. There weren't necessarily scratches, but... you can just tell sometimes... However it ran smoothly, no issues. Love the game!
customer_reviews.author: C Diener

customer_reviews.title: I was waiting for this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved Supernatural from Sims 2 so I was so excited to see it finally come out for the Sims 3. I love that you can play a witch, fairy, werewolf, ghost, or vampire. I feel like there may have been one more, but I can't remember. I always end up playing a witch. :) I watched Charmed during my whole childhood, so I can't resist.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lampkin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite expansion pack so far (this is said after owning Ambitions, WA, Seasons, Pets, University, Late Night and Generations). It gives you the most interesting things to do with the new subspecies of people, and also, lost of fun with the Alchemy skill!
customer_reviews.author: Axadorea

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, and it was so much easier, and it was cheaper to buy here instead of Orgin. It was so easy to link my amazon account to my Orgin account. I actually stumbled on this because Orgin wouldn't take my giftcard visa I got for my birthday to I looked for other options to purchase my game which I was glad I did because I saved a couple bucks, and the Amazon website makes it so easy I was playing in no time. Hats off to amazon for providing instant access games, etc. I will be buying more games this way.
customer_reviews.author: Denise kelly

customer_reviews.title: ... run the game it does absolutely nothing what a waste of money and many hours trying to get this ...
customer_reviews.text: So before I ordered this is was said that yes it will work with windows 8 and no it does not need a disc but it doesn't work at all I have exhausted all my options for making this game work with my computer updating patches and much more and still when trying to run the game it does absolutely nothing what a waste of money and many hours trying to get this instant access game to work!!!! VERY UPSET WITH THIS!!! IT DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Nicole Beard

customer_reviews.title: So Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I played this game the day it arrived and at first it was a little confusing on what each supernatural could do. After about 30 min I got the hang of it. If you are a vampire the game is a little harder because they have to drink blood often and can be outside for very long. But the plus side of being a vamp is reading people's minds and sucking blood. The only down side of this game is if you are a witch your face looks older in game play then when you create your character. Other then that I love this game and play it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee O.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the price I paid! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: J.P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ghosts, zombies, fairies, vampires, and other supernatural creatures add a different twist to the popular SIMS game.
customer_reviews.author: gtjblloyd

customer_reviews.title: ... so I haven't played it but it came in perfect condition. I'm sure my daughter will love it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift so I haven't played it but it came in perfect condition. I'm sure my daughter will love it as we watch Supernatural every week together.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have code for me to use, had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Zakyrah

customer_reviews.title: This Game Is Supernatural
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming experience as you can change your Sims from human to werewolf and everything in-between
customer_reviews.author: Nic Coplin

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have not played with this expansion pack yet, but my older daughter (she is 18) just loves it as does her little brother and her older sister - I am sure I will enjoy it too. The girls say that building the sims is fun and they enjoy the new options of werewolves and fairies. Great expansion pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite expansion
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite expansion by far! I love the new creatures. The fairies and witches are my favorite, but the other new choices are also great. The inclusion of magic in the world gives lots of new options and interactions that are so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: The Sims 3 Supernatural!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this expansion pack! Witches, fairies, werewolves and vampires. My favorite sims 3 expansion pack 💚💚
customer_reviews.author: Bart&Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this for any preteen or teen
customer_reviews.text: My teen daughter loves this game. She still uses it over a year later. Would recommend this for any preteen or teen. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: marjorie wells

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, great quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: It is truly an amazing idea for instant access, saves a trip to the store. No glitches or any other malfunctions occurred. Works as well as a CD copy. Way cheaper (and might I say easier) than the regular CD.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Yim

customer_reviews.title: So fun, but watch out for zombies
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite of all the Sims 3 games. It adds a whole new dimension to the game. The only bad part is all the darn zombies! They eat your garden on the full moon. I figured out that if you just fence it and lock the gate to everyone but your household it solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Game Is Really Fun! And It Comes With A Lot Of New Items Also. Not OnlyThings For Each Character, But For The House As well. Such As Furnature And Things For The Yard, Oh And New Outfits! It's Pretty Easy To Become Any Supernatural... Well Zombies Are A Little More Difficult. Some Of Them Can Be Created In The "Make A Sim" Category.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Stracener

customer_reviews.title: Great EP
customer_reviews.text: I love this EP because, it expands on one of my favorite additions from Late Night; vampires. The addition of other supernatural creatures is really cool and the new personality traits and skills make the game more fun and interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Rawrrbot

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and game works great!
customer_reviews.text: This game arrived so fast! I was expecting it near the middle of the month but I came home from work to a pleasant surprise. The keys are valid. The game runs great. I would buy from this seller again for my next Sims expansion pack.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great expansion and entertaining. Having the ability to become multiple characters in this expansion makes The Sims 3 more entertaining and less dull. If you are starting to hit a rut in the game like I was I would totally grab this expansion and see were it leads you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. It came in on time. The actual product is so much fun. I can spend hours playing this game,I don't know if that's a good thing, but i guess it means this game is entertaining. I would suggest it to any one who loves the Sims, obviously, but also to any one who likes slower games that include real life play and time. If you have a short attention span and love games where there is a constant boom Sims may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Fun expansion
customer_reviews.text: Mostly purchased this for my wife, though I do dabble in sims a bit. Mostly to build houses. *laugh* She has enjoyed it more then most of the other expansions throughout the sims. And I have enjoyed the stuff in it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Arlack

customer_reviews.title: An Interesting addition
customer_reviews.text: This is was easy to install on to my computer. It has very interesting additions from the supernatural added to the games. I like the fact that you can create your sims to be a supernatural character. It is everything I would expect from the creators of "The Sims".
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brouillette

customer_reviews.title: Can't Even Play It
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even send the book with my code to let me download the game I purchased. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: but i really do love this pack i personally had a lot of fun ...
customer_reviews.text: I understand why This pack wouldn't be everyone's cup of tea, but i really do love this pack i personally had a lot of fun with it i love the clothing and the music, plus the supernaturals have a nice twist too them overall i think its pretty cool worth the money to me! :)
customer_reviews.author: Redlovesyou

customer_reviews.title: Missing...
customer_reviews.text: Game looks ok... However it did NOT come with the game key... Fast shipping though
customer_reviews.author: Joey Ford

customer_reviews.title: Werewolves, Witches and Zombies!!! Oh My!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge Sims 3 Fan and this one is a great expansion pack for it. New world, New characters and tons of new things to add to a already outstanding game. I got a great deal on Supernatural when it first released through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shylittlelatina

customer_reviews.title: So many fun scenarios...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game if you love dark fantasy. Hilarious twists. Wonderful way to live out supernatural fantasies.
customer_reviews.author: KASSAUNDRA LUCAS

customer_reviews.title: Great expansion!
customer_reviews.text: Loads of new stuff in this expansion. I love the ability to be a fairy, witch and werewolf. It adds a whole dimension to the game for me. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: I use a mod to turn off the zombies, but other than that I play the game as intended. You can play as a Witch, Vampire, Fairy or Werewolf - my favorite are the fairies. If you are into the Sims, this is one expansion pack that is really worth it (unlike Showtime).
customer_reviews.author: J. Oge

customer_reviews.title: Beware Sims
customer_reviews.text: Love the game, this had some great new items. Seller was great, they arrived in great shape. My ultimate favorite Sims expansion...ok next to Pets...one word Horses. Would Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Quiqzal

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a wierd add on pack, but only because of the vampire, werewolves and fairies. It's kind of funny too. I gave it 4 stars for one reason only. I am tired of the video game industry making you have to download your bonuses.(plants vs zombies) These should come with the game automatically if it is a selling point.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love all the new outfits/hairstyles for females - and the body hair addition for men. The objects you can buy are pretty fun - and you can choose your "super" self. If you can score this for under $20 - it's totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosky

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun, and SO Many New Items!
customer_reviews.text: I have been so torn about which expansion pack I wanted, but I am very pleased with my choice! This expansion pack has SO MANY new objects, items, and game play options. It definitely added a new magic to The Sims 3 that has peaked my interest in playing again. Just what I wanted/needed! Super fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Weldon

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in perfect condition. The game installed and plays beautifully; no complaints. Definitely a game I would recommend to others, although I would suggest that you only get it if you have a good processor; the fairy wings made my game freeze quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The game itself is awesome. However I haven't figured out how to use ...
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is awesome. However I haven't figured out how to use several expansions with it. It only seems to play pets, and the original some 3 with the supernatural.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Grier

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. I have no idea what sims are? They say 4 stars so I guess I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game it is great and so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Matthews

product_meta.title: The Sims 3 Supernatural
product_meta.description:
Platform:PCEnter the mysterious town of Moonlight Falls where strange things happen by the light of the moon. Create supernatural beings from menacing werewolves and cackling witches, to mischievous fairies and more intriguing vampires. Then stalk the night, use your wand to cast spells, claw the furniture and more. You can mix dozens of elixirs that can turn Sims into zombies or transform them into gold. Share your enchanted brews with any friends who have The Sims 3! Spooky surprises are in store for you in the world of The Sims 3 Supernatural!

AMAZON.COM


Spooky surprises are in store for you in the world of The Sims 3 Supernatural! Create supernatural beings from menacing werewolves and cackling witches, to mischievous fairies and more intriguing vampires.

Play as supernatural Sims Hone your magical crafts Explore the town Moonlight Falls SYNOPSIS
Enter the mysterious town of Moonlight Falls where strange things happen by the light of the moon. Then stalk the night, use your wand to cast spells, claw the furniture and more. You can mix dozens of elixirs that can turn Sims into zombies or transform them into gold. Share your enchanted brews with any friends who have The Sims 3!



KEY FEATURES:
 * Play as supernatural Sims:Create witches, wizards, werewolves, more intriguing vampires, and fairies, each with their own magical abilities, traits, and interactions.
   
 * Explore the town of Moonlight Falls: Discover what mysteries and abilities are revealed by the light of the full moon. Will your Sims freak out or become more powerful?
   
 * Hone your magical crafts and share the enchantment: Learn to cast spells and find rare ingredients to brew elixirs, so you can charm or hex your Sims’ lives. Send your magical elixirs to any of your friends’ games who have The Sims 3. Your Sims can hone their psychic abilities and build a career as mystic fortune teller.
   
 * Discover supernatural items: Race around the arena on your broomstick, visit the gypsy caravan, or preen in front of your magic mirror. Even awaken the classic character of Bonehilda, the quirky skeletal maid. With tons of new enchanted objects, what will happen next?
   
 * Deck out your home in gothic style: Add a secret lair with the sliding bookcase door and fill your home with creepy new furniture.
   
 * Zombification: Mix a special elixir to create shuffling, brain-hungry monsters of your very own. Chomp on other Sims to spread the love and wreak havoc. Don’t fret, you can always concoct an elixir to change your Sims back.






PC system Requirements:

Miniminm OS : Windows 7, XP, Vista.

CPU: 2.0 GHz P4 procesor or equivalent for XP

 2.4 GHz P4 procesor or equivalent for vista and windows 7.

RAM: 1 GB for XP , 1.5 GB for vista and windows 7, atleast 2GB for NVIDIA ION Computers.

Disc Drive: DVD Drive

Hard Drive : Atleast 3.5GB of free space, 9.6 GB if installing with The Sims 3.

Video: DirectX 9.0C compatibility video card with 128 MB of video RAM and support for Pixel shader 2.0

Supported Video Cards: NVIDIA GeForce 6 series or better, all NVIDIA G, GT, GTS and GTX video cards.

ATI Radeon series card 9500 series or better, amd all ATI X, X1 and HD video cards.

Intel Graphics Media Accelerator (GMA): GMA 3 series , 4 series.



Please note: The GeForce 6100 amd 7100 are not supported.

Explore the town of Moonlight Falls: Discover what mysteries and abilities are revealed by the light of the full moon. Will your Sims freak out or become more powerful?
Hone your magical crafts and share the enchantment: Learn to cast spells and find rare ingredients to brew elixirs, so you can charm or hex your Sims? Lives
